rewards.title: Exclusive Guided Meditation Sessions
rewards.text: Donors receive access to a series of exclusive guided meditation sessions led by renowned mindfulness experts, accessible only to those who contribute to the fundraiser.

rewards.title: Personalized Thank-You Video from Beneficiaries
rewards.text: Donors receive access to a series of exclusive guided meditation sessions led by renowned mindfulness experts, accessible only to those who contribute to the fundraiser.

rewards.title: Recognition on the ZenQuest Donor Wall
rewards.text: Donors can have their names or a personalized message displayed on the ZenQuest Donor Wall within the app, showcasing their commitment to promoting mindfulness and mental well-being.

rewards.title: Early Access to New Features
rewards.text: Donors receive access to a series of exclusive guided meditation sessions led by renowned mindfulness experts, accessible only to those who contribute to the fundraiser.
